typedef vector<int> VI;
int fcin(){register int c = gc();int x = 0;for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}return x;}
int arr[10000];
int main(){
	int n,m,prev;
	int a,b,A,B;
	int tests=fcin();
	while(tests--){
			n = fcin();
			m = fcin();
			for (int i=0;i<m;i++) {
				scanf("%d",arr+i);
			}
			prev = arr[0];
			a=b=A=B=0;
			for(int i=1;i<m;i++){
				if(arr[i] == prev)b--;
				a=a-(arr[i]-prev);
				b=b+(arr[i]-prev);
				prev=arr[i];
				A=min(a,A);
				B=min(b,B);
			}
			B = max(1,1-B);
			A = max(0,-A);
			if (A+B > n)
				printf("-1\n");
			else 
				printf("%d\n",B);
	}
}
